sentences.english: Jiang's current visit will definitely advance bilateral ties.

sentences.english: Cape Mount has beautiful scenery and quiet environment, is indeed visit to Cuba Probe into the nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 角山风景秀丽，环境清幽，实为探幽访古之佳境。

sentences.english: We went to Mount Tai to visit historical sites this vacation.
sentences.chinese: 年假期，我们曾到泰山访古。

sentences.english: Indochina Peninsula in Cuba, Tokyo ruins Yaoji Chinese fathers.
sentences.chinese: 中南半岛访古，东京废墟遥祭华夏列祖。
